name: Jiří Helmich
tagline: Web Developer at Mews, Ph.D. candidate at MFF CUNI
body:
### About me
Ph.D. student at Faculty of Mathematics and Physics at Charles University in Prague, interested in Linked (Open) Data.

Polyglot web developer with experience with ASP.NET MVC, Play Framework (1.x Java, 2.3 Scala) and AngularJS.

### Work
Provided services:

- Continuous integration advisory (Versioning Systems, buildservers, buildscrips, development workflow)
- System architecture design
- Development supervision

### International cooperation and projects

#### EU FP7-ICT project – COMSODE
Components Supporting the Open Data Exploitation
Ref.: 611358, http://www.comsode.eu/
Researcher [2014 - 2015]
EU FP7-ICT project – LOD2

#### LOD2
Creating Knowledge out of Interlinked Data
Ref.: 257943, http://lod2.eu/
Researcher [2013 - 2014]

### Publications
- Helmich, J. ­ Klimek, J. ­ Necasky, M.: Visualizing RDF Data Cubes Using the Linked Data Visualization Model. The Semantic Web: ESWC Satellite Events 2014, LNCS 8798 proceedings, DOI: 10.1007/978­3­319­11955­7.50 (link)
- Klímek J., Helmich J., Nečaský M.: Application of the Linked Data Visualization Model on Real World Data from the Czech LOD Cloud, CEUR-WS Vol. 1184: LDOW 2014 - Linked Data on the Web (link)
- Klímek J., Helmich J., Nečaský M.: Payola: Collaborative Linked Data Analysis and Visualization Framework, in The Semantic Web: ESWC 2013 Satellite Events, Montpellier, France, Springer Verlag, ISBN: 978-3-642-41241-7, ISSN: 0302-9743, pp. 147-151, 2013 (link)
